question:
you have seen an advertisement in an Australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six month and look after their six-yeras-old child.
write a letter to the parents.In your letter
explan why you would like the job
give ditails of why you would be a suitable person to employ
say how you would spend your free time while you are in Astralia
text: I hope this letter finds you well.I am writing this letter to tell you I am ready to take this job because I think this job is extremely appropriate for me in addition, I believe this situation is fully helping me to find myself and after ,that the reason for this is I am having some important work to do so I have decided to get this work.

If you let me I want to give some information about myself and firstly I have a lot of free time to keep your children and ,second I have must energetic because I am just 25 years old However, I have related work experience.
This day I am going to the gym and although I prefer to go to the swimming pool if I can and after doing an exercise I always stay at home and study books.
Do let me know at the earliest possible convenience.
